=template
## Run  c{copies}b{ber}  for  {family}/{specific}/
## Generated file; do not edit.
# This comment should be removed.

# Command to go at the top of each instruction file.  
python main.py {{family}} {{specific}} {{length}} {{seed}} --ncopies {{copies}} --ber {{ber}} {{extra1}} {{extra2}} {{extra3}} > {{output}} 2>&1 &

# Each file will contain the above command line and all these individual instruction lines.  
output,family,specific,length,seed,copies,ber,extra1,extra2,extra3 
{family}/{specific}/log/c{copies}b{ber}s{s1}.log,{family},{specific},0,{s1},{copies},{ber}000,{extra1},{extra2},{extra3},
